amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Department of Energy's Office of Science account by $10 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Science account under the Department of Energy by $10 million and increase the Spending Reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 291 (Roll no. 577).
